```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(quantreg)
library(tidyverse)
library(dlookr)
library(broom)
library(DataExplorer)
library(here)
library(ggridges)

bslib::bs_themer()

custom_palette <- c("#9F4576", "#607B8B")

data <- read_csv(here("Dados/nces330_20.csv"), col_types = "iccccd") %>%
  rename(cost = "Value") %>%
  rename_with(.fn = str_to_lower)
```

### Chart A

```{r}
data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cost, type, fill = type)) +
  ggridges::geom_density_ridges(scale = 0.8, alpha = 0.75) +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#192D45", "#748CDB", "#163B88", "#C1DFF9"))
```
